name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Oranges Campari
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's clever take on an adult fruit cocktail perfect for the holiday season. Oranges are in season now and campari is a perfect foil for them. These Oranges Campari should come with a NC-21 rating. They are a holiday libation in a bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Peel as many oranges as your need, and slice into rounds.
Toss with the Campari, about 1 tablespoon per orange.
Throw in a large sprig of fresh Rosemary, toss well, and remove it.
